General.Name: Zhejiang Runyang New Material Technology Co. Ltd.
General.Description: Zhejiang Runyang New Material Technology Co., Ltd. engages in the research and development, production, and sale of polyolefin foam materials in China and internationally. It offers electron irradiation cross-linked polyethylene (IXPE), including antibacterial enhanced series, popular series, and special series. The company's IXPE products are used as high-performance basic materials; and other products are used in home building decoration, car interior, baby products, sports and leisure, consumer electronics, household appliances, medical equipment, and other industries. Zhejiang Runyang New Material Technology Co., Ltd. was founded in 2012 and is based in Hangzhou, China.
General.Address: No. 800 Minhe Road, Building 1, Hangzhou, China, 313102
